title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - May 25th, 2019
itunes:title: Bloomberg Businessweek Weekend - May 25th, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring highlights from the latest issue of Bloomberg Businessweek.

-Nico Grant details how Salesforce’s success rides on deals often made from the gut

-Benedikt Kammel profiles a startup looking to become a Spotify for classical music buffs

-Cristina Lindblad explains how President Trump’s tariffs are sending shockwaves through Spain’s olive groves.

-Plus, an exclusive interview with Chuck Robbins, the CEO of Cisco.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
